column4: I must say... I love linux so far. I just wish microsoft office 2007 worked on it. I need it for work, only reason I keep vista around.
openoffice is nice, but it does not compare with the features, sadly. And it murders xdoc files.
or use wine...office 2007 works very well on wine.

Right...think of wine as an open source implementation of the windows API's. You can install and run windows apps using the wine engine, and it translates between the windows language (used by your program) and the linux language.
